document.discussion_title: Cincinnati Masters: Sania Mirza defeats former partner Martina Hingis to be sole owner of No 1 spot
document.topic_text: Sania Mirza and Martina Hingis parted ways after Rogers Cup only to end up standing opposite each other at the Cincinnati Masters finals. Sania, paired with Barbora Strycova from the Czech Republic, defeated Martina, who has teamed up with Coco Vandeweghe of the United States of America, 7-5, 6-4. With the win, Sania retained ... »
